sen.j: 栃餅（とちもち）は、灰汁灰汁抜きした栃の実（トチノキの実）をもち米とともに蒸してからつき、餅にしたものである。
sen.e: Tochi mochi is a rice cake made by steaming conker after removal of harshness with glutinous rice and then pounding them.

sen.e: Tochi mochi has tinges of yellow ocher and brown comparing to a rice cake made from only glutinous rice, and has unique bitterness.

sen.e: Tochi mochi was important foodstuffs once in the mountain village where rice is hardly grown. It has been sold as one of the souvenirs as of the beginning in the 21st century.
